title: signal_timing_phase

signal_phase_id.description: Optional. Foreign key, the associated sigal phase.

signal_phase_num.description: Optional. Redundant with the record in the signal_phase table.

min_green.description: Required. The minimum green time in seconds for an actuated signal. Green time in seconds for a fixed time signal.

max_green.description: Optional.The maximum green time in seconds for an actuated signal; the default is minimum green plus one extension

extension.description: Optional. The number of seconds the green time is extended each time vehicles are detected.

clearance.description: Required. Yellow interval plus all red interval

walk_time.description: Required if have ped phase. If a pedestrian phase exists, the walk time in seconds

ped_clearance.description: Required if have ped phase. If a pedestrian phase exists, the flashing donâ€™t walk time.

description: For signalizd nodes, provides signal timing.
